main event: A bright white object with a smoke track was observed briefly in the sky over Boreland, Michigan, on July 8, 1958.
interesting points: The object was round, bright white, and left a smoke trail behind it., The sighting lasted for only 1 second., The observation was reported by a civilian., The object was described as the size of a pea at arm's length., The report concluded that the object was consistent with the characteristics of a meteor.
